title: PSU banks raise loan rates as deposit costs rise
description: BoB and Canara Bank have increased their lending rates by 5 basis points on six-month and one-year tenures with effect from August 12. UCO Bank, too, has raised its lending rates by 5 bps, effective from August 10. One bps is 0.01 percentage point.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
